p: When considering chlorhexidine digluconate, it exhibited the similar effect as C. verum leaf oil (damaging cell walls of Candida cells and cause cytoplasmic leakages). Further, according to SEM observations, chlorhexidine digluconate decreased pseudo hyphae formation of C. tropicalis compared to negative control. Extracellular polymeric matrix that is characteristic of biofilms was not observed in any of the biofilms analysed using SEM since pre-treatments and electron beam of the equipment can cause the matrix destruction.
